sobre.descricao1: Software Developer since 2024, working with web applications and cloud solutions. Experienced in .NET (C#), Java Spring, and Angular, applying best practices in architecture, version control with Git, and continuous integration.
sobre.descricao2: Currently part of the cloud development team at Invent Software, contributing to the TaxPlus.NF-e application and leading the migration of the TaxPlus.GNRE system from desktop to a cloud-based architecture, focusing on scalability, performance, and maintainability.

sobre.descricao4: with a focus on community and knowledge sharing.

estagio.descricao: I took part in the Coders Growth program, developing desktop and web applications in C#. Explored best practices such as Onion Architecture, automated testing, and the use of modern frameworks, consolidating my foundation in full stack development.

tecnico-em-desenvolvido.descricao: I work as a full stack developer in the Electronic Documents team, focused on migrating and modernizing tax systems to the cloud. Responsible for the evolution of TaxPlus.GNRE and contributing to TaxPlus.NF-e and DF-e systems, ensuring scalability and high performance.

analista-i.descricao: I work on the maintenance and evolution of TaxPlus cloud products such as NF-e, DF-e, and GNRE. I also contribute to the development of new products, including TaxPlus Tax Reform, aimed at impact analysis, simulation, and projection of the Tax Reform for companies.
